response.overview: Mon (15), a shy teenager with expressive eyes and buck teeth, runs away from school with Angel (16), his rebellious best friend, to celebrate their fifth anniversary of friendship at the skatepark where they usually skate. On the way, Mon doubts whether or not to continue, but Angel convinces him. Before skating, they have breakfast, while they remember how they met and exchanged gifts, exchanging shy glances. As Mon prepares to join him, he watches Angel skate and imagines him with angel wings. After playing in the skatepark, they take a break, share a cigarette, exchange glances, and then continue skating. After a while, Angel confesses to Mon that he likes someone, but doesn't know how to tell him. This causes Mon to lose his balance and fall, causing a scrape on his knee, which Angel helps to heal. Mon, at the end of the day, not having dared to tell Angel how he feels, takes off his skates, puts on a shoe, and finds a note from Angel with a declaration of love.
response.title: El débil color rosado
